page.title: 17LOCAL HISTORY & CHANGE(cont)
page.content:
3.Water was taken from the river and only some houses had gas lights. 4.The biggest changes were the growth and decline of industry and the establishment of an enterprise zone. There are large stores e.g. Tesco and MFI which had increased traffic. 5.Miss Bodycombe said that families were bigger and there was little to eat.She remembered asking her mother what was for tea and being told "a piece of bread and the lovely smell from next door!". 6.Mr. Lloyd Jones told us he had very little pocket money and when he started work he earned only a few shillings each month.We enjoyed the interviews and learned a lot about our area.
{Talycopa}
